modName: Compatibility Patch for Requiem and Height Adjusted Races with True Giants
summary: A small compatibility patch I made for myself for the complete version of Height Adjusted Races with True Giants to go with Requiem.
descriptionHtml:
I love Requiem: The Role-playing Overhaul by Ogerboss. I love the immersion it brings and the difficulty that accompanies it. I also love Height Adjusted Races with True Giants by EvilDeadAsh34 since in my opinion, this mod complements Requiem rather nicely from a visual immersion perspective. But these two were not compatible; you could get the heights right but lost Requiem's stats or keep the stats and lose the heights. This patch tries to keep the stats and the height respectively from Requiem and HAR.

Requirements:
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
Requiem
Height Adjusted Races with True Giants (the Complete Version but not the one with small giants)

Installation:
Just copy the .esp file into the Data folder and then activate it via Skyrim Launcher, NMM or Wrye Bash.

Uninstallation:
Simply disable the plugin.

Remarks:
This is something that I have done for the first time. I am not a programmer, not a coder or a designer. I am a buiseness graduate with immense passion for Skyrim and respect for its community. So if I have done something wrong here, please let me know, since I would love to learn.
author: Noob

files.name: Requiem - Height Adjusted Races with True Giants Patch
